scripts.postinstall: pip3 install --upgrade pdm --break-system-packages && pdm install && touch $(pdm run python -c 'import os, pypika_tortoise; print(os.path.dirname(pypika_tortoise.__file__))')/py.typed
scripts.format: pdm run ruff check --select I --fix && pdm run ruff format
scripts.publish: pdm run python -m twine upload dist/* -u __token__ -p $PYPI_API_TOKEN
